title: Agricultural Cooperative Day
detail_text: <:th_ch0008/>Eli-chan, do you know what day it is today?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Eh? It’s not somebody’s birthday.... right? It’s not a holiday either.... I don’t know. What day is it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Eeeh.... Y-, you don’t know about the agricultural cooperative day....!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Agricultural.... cooperative day?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>That’s right! Today is the day the Agricultural Cooperative Act was enacted! Thanks to the farmers all over the country and the co-ops that united them, we’re now able to eat delicious rice every day!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>T-, that’s.... a day worthy of celebration, I guess.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>I knew you would think so too, Eli-chan! Then, let’s have an onigiri party to celebrate it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Fufu, that sounds fun. Let’s get all kinds of ingredients and make them with everyone.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Yaaay! I love you, Eli-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Now that it’s decided, we just need to contact the rest of everyone♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
